Screenwriter: Anne Fontaine, Pascal Bonitzer, Pascal Bonitzer
Production Co: Canal+, Gaumont, France Télévision, Ruby Films, Ciné, Orange Cinéma Séries, Albertine Productions, Cinéfrance 1888, British Film Institute, France 2 Cinéma
Synopsis: After moving to the French countryside with her husband (Jason Flemyng), a British beauty (Gemma Arterton) draws the attention of a local baker (Fabrice Luchini), a young playboy and her magnetic ex.
Title: Gemma Bovery
